alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 10:05PM EST until further notice by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schroon River at Riverbank. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Water is over Tannery Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:46 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 7.4 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schroon River Riverbank Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Wed 9 pm: 8.8 Forecast: Thu 1 am 8.7 Thu 7 am 8.6 Thu 1 pm 8.5 Thu 7 pm 8.4 Fri 1 am 8.2 Fri 7 am 8.1 Fri 1 pm 7.9 Fri 7 pm 7.7 Sat 1 am 7.6 Sat 7 am 7.4 &&
